评论概述: The picture is not the actual color
评论详情: The color is not what I expected I thought it was a charcoal, it was the black. The quality wasn’t what I expected. Love the design.
Dope design, poor quality. Cozy fit but doesn’t appear stonewashed as pictured. Soft & cheap.

Quality is nothing as advertised, it doesn’t even look like the pictures , kind of disappointed I wanted to give a clothing brand a chance and they didn’t provide the expectation. I wouldn’t recommend.
